column4: hey guys..im trying to install ubuntu 5.10 but its not able to detect a cd-rom on my ibm thinkpad.  The Live CD booted fine and ran fine.  Suse also installed fine.  Any ideas?
anyone know where to download some linux cd-drom drivers to try with the ubuntu install?  its not detecting my cdrom in my ibm thinkpad
SEJeFF: well i need to do something cuz the setup won't detect my drive
how do you do a network install with ubuntu?
i didn't see the option in setup
or an ftp install like suse had
hmmm this sounds like its going to be a lot of work :)
Read the second url I gave you
im just confused why the so called distrib that could rival windows can't even find my cdrom drive lol
thats screwed up..just rebooted and tried again.
